payroll_ranged_data.source: SELECT SUM(annual_salary) as annual_salary,SUM(gross_pay) as gross_pay,SUM(overtime_pay) as overtime_pay,agency_id,fiscal_year_id,type_of_year,civil_service_title,civil_service_title_code,type_of_employment FROM aggregateon_payroll_employee_agency GROUP BY agency_id, employee_id, type_of_employment, fiscal_year_id, type_of_year, civil_service_title, civil_service_title_code, employee_number

gross_pay_g250k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) > 250000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_g250k_count_title.function: COUNT(DISTINCT (CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) > 250000 THEN civil_service_title END))

gross_pay_g101k_le250k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) > 100000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay,0) <= 250000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_g101k_le250k_count_title.function: COUNT(DISTINCT(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) > 100000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay,0) <= 250000 THEN civil_service_title END))

gross_pay_g51k_le100k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) > 50000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay,0) <= 100000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_g51k_le100k_count_title.function: COUNT(DISTINCT(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) > 50000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay,0) <= 100000 THEN civil_service_title END))

gross_pay_ge20k_le50k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) >= 20000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay,0) <= 50000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_ge20k_le50k_count_title.function: COUNT(DISTINCT(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) >= 20000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay,0) <= 50000 THEN civil_service_title END))

gross_pay_less20k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) < 20000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_less20k_count_title.function: COUNT(DISTINCT(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) < 20000 THEN civil_service_title END))
